text:
Yeah, zulip is the place - there are a couple of courses that have taken different approaches, I used github classroom, but didn't really plug into their functionality as it's not super well documented for languages other than C and I think python.

I just used CI essentially, you can see what I did here: <https://github.com/wellesley-bisc195>

And I'm happy to answer any questions
